fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Business and Industry, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Participation in ECSF (Equity Crowdfunding Stakeholder Forum)
organisation_name: Associazione Italiana delle società di consulenza per la ricerca l'innovazione e lo sviluppo (AISCRIS)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Aiscris operates within the framework of Confindustria www.confindustria.it
goals__remit:
AISCRIS is the Italian Association in Innovation, Research and Development, Consulting Companies.  
It belongs to the wider CONFINDUSTRIA, Servizi Innovativi e Tecnologici (Federation of Innovative and Technological Services), representing about 17.000 businesses, €117 billions turnover and 600.000 employees.  
 
Founded in Italy in 1990, AISCRIS represent, assist and defend the interests of innovation, research and development at a national and international level.  
AISCRIS, also support the development of international cooperation through initiatives and discussions, and have actively managed several events.  
 
Members are mostly small and medium enterprises involved with innovation.
